scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of material from the 1970s-1980s accumulated by Lincoln Brigade veteran Randall B. (Pete) Smith in his role as chair of the Veterans of the Abraham Lincoln Brigade (VALB) Historical Commission. It contains of files on various collective and individual veterans' projects (historical and commemorative), including the researching, funding and publication of Prisoners of the Good Fight (1986) by Carl Geiser. There are also typescripts of some twenty published and unpublished memoirs of varying length. Includes correspondence with veterans, researchers, and other individuals, as well as clippings, articles, and mailing lists.
